languages.text: Часть щитов корабля, защищающая определенную его часть. Два щита прикрывают бока корабля, один закрывает нос и еще один — корму.
One part of a voidship's shields system. Two shield arrays cover the ship's sides, one protects its bow, and one its stern.
languages.original_text: Часть щитов корабля, защищающая определенную его часть. Два щита прикрывают бока корабля, один закрывает нос и еще один — корму.

traits.locale_text: One part of a voidship's shields system. Two shield arrays cover the ship's sides, one protects its bow, and one its stern.

languages.text: Ein Teil des Schildsystems eines Raumschiffs. Die Seiten des Schiffes werden von zwei Schildreihen geschützt, Bug und Heck jeweils von einer.
languages.original_text: One part of a voidship's shields system. Two shield arrays cover the ship's sides, one protects its bow, and one its stern.

traits.locale_text: Ein Teil des Schildsystems eines Raumschiffs. Die Seiten des Schiffes werden von zwei Schildreihen {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}geschützt{/g}, Bug und Heck jeweils von einer.

languages.text: Partie du système de boucliers d'un vaisseau spatial. Deux rangées de boucliers couvrent les flancs du vaisseau, l'une protège sa proue et l'autre sa poupe.
languages.original_text: One part of a voidship's shields system. Two shield arrays cover the ship's sides, one protects its bow, and one its stern.

traits.locale_text: Partie du système de boucliers d'un vaisseau spatial. Deux rangées de boucliers {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couvrent{/g} les flancs du vaisseau, l'une protège sa proue et l'autre sa poupe.

languages.text: 虚空舰防护系统的组件。整艘舰船由两个护盾阵列进行保护，一个保护舰首，一个保护船尾。
languages.original_text: One part of a voidship's shields system. Two shield arrays cover the ship's sides, one protects its bow, and one its stern.

traits.locale_text: 虚空舰防护系统的组件。整艘舰船由两个护盾阵列进行保护，一个保护船首，一个保护船尾。{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}{/g}

languages.original_text: One part of a voidship's shields system. Two shield arrays cover the ship's sides, one protects its bow, and one its stern.

languages.text: Parte del sistema de escudos de una nave del vacío. Hay dos sistemas de escudos que cubren los costados de la nave, otro que protege la proa y otro la popa.
languages.original_text: One part of a voidship's shields system. Two shield arrays cover the ship's sides, one protects its bow, and one its stern.

traits.locale_text: Parte del sistema de escudos de una nave del vacío. Hay dos sistemas de escudos que {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cubren{/g} los costados de la nave, otro que protege la proa y otro la popa.

languages.text: ヴォイドシールドシステムの一部。2つのシールドアレイが船の側面を覆い、1つは船首を、もうひ1つは船尾を守る。
languages.original_text: One part of a voidship's shields system. Two shield arrays cover the ship's sides, one protects its bow, and one its stern.

traits.locale_text: ヴォイドシールドシステムの一部。2つのシールドアレイが船の側面を{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}覆い{/g}、1つは船首を、もうひ1つは船尾を守る。

languages.text: Uçsuz gemisinin kalkan sisteminin parçalarına verilen isim. İki kalkan dizilimi, geminin yanlarını korurken; biri pruvasını, bir diğeri de kıç tarafını muhafaza eder.
languages.original_text: One part of a voidship's shields system. Two shield arrays cover the ship's sides, one protects its bow, and one its stern.
